summary: The story of Irena Sendler, a social worker who was part of the Polish underground during World War II and was arrested by the Nazis for saving the lives of nearly 2,500 Jewish children by smuggling them out of the Warsaw ghetto.
cast: Anna Paquin|Marcia Gay Harden|Goran Visnjic|Nathaniel Parker|Steve Speirs|Paul Freeman|Michelle Dockery|Danuta Stenka|Iddo Goldberg|Maja Ostaszewska|Krzysztof Pieczynski|Rebecca Windheim|Olga Boladz|Leigh Lawson|Scott Handy|Sergei Novik-Marchenko|Jerzy Nowak|Toms Aboltins|Romualds Ancans|Ruby Bentall|Valda Bickute|Gintaire Cepukonye|Stanislavs Cibulis|Paulius Cizinauskas|Vilis Daudzins|Karolina Dryzner|Didzis Eglitis|William Ellis|Dmitri Eroshenko|Fiona Glascott|Leonîds Grabovskis|Andris Gross|Jurgis Gundars|Uga Gundars|Elea Hofland|Kengurs Janis|Arnita Jaunzeme|Janis Kangaroo|Leonarda Klavina-Kestere|Girts Krumins|Girts Liuziniks|Girts Lukevics|Ariela Mareda|Jeff Most|Rebecca Night|David Ogannesianc|Aleksandrs Petukhovs|Erich Redman|Janis Reinis|Kristina Savickyte|Gleb Semionov|Irena Sendlerowa|Will Shadley|Sofya Skya|Dace Smits|Martins Smits|Davids Stepanjans|Imants Strads|Antanas Surgailis|Aija Terauda|Anastasija Timoshenko|Sakalas Uzdavinys|Imants Vekmanis|Danny Webb|Odrija Zaula
title: El corazón valiente de Irena Sendler
